name: pixel-engine
description: A high-performance typed-array based pixel simulation engine.
author: nicolaslema

scripts.build:packages: npm run build -w @pixel-engine/core && npm run build -w @pixel-engine/effects
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:packages
scripts.verify: npm run test && npm run build:all && npm run typecheck
scripts.pack:dry: npm pack --dry-run && npm pack --dry-run -w @pixel-engine/core && npm pack --dry-run -w @pixel-engine/effects
scripts.release:check: npm run verify && npm run pack:dry && npm run smoke:consumer
